metadata.name: Next Step
metadata.description: Component for displaying prominent action or next step suggestion. Features a distinctive visual design with highlight stripe and call-to-action functionality.
metadata.author: CivicTheme

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Theme variation controlling the visual appearance

vertical_spacing.title: Vertical Spacing
vertical_spacing.description: Vertical spacing position for the component

attributes.title: HTML Attributes
attributes.description: Additional HTML attributes to apply to the root element

modifier_class.title: Modifier Classes
modifier_class.description: Additional CSS classes for styling variations

url.title: Link URL
url.description: URL to navigate to for the next step action

is_new_window.title: Open in New Window
is_new_window.description: Whether to open the link in a new window/tab

is_external.title: External Link
is_external.description: Whether the link is external (affects styling and behavior)

examples.title: Next steps title from knob
examples.content: Short summary explaining why this link is relevant.

title.title: Next Step Title
title.description: Main title for the next step action (required for component to render)

content.title: Next Step Content
content.description: Descriptive content explaining the next step or call-to-action
examples: Get the latest updates delivered to your inbox
Our team is ready to help you get started

content_top.title: Top Content
content_top.description: Content area at the top of the component for additional context

content_bottom.title: Bottom Content
content_bottom.description: Content area at the bottom for supplementary information

layout.container: Uses Bootstrap-like grid system (container, row, col)
layout.highlight_stripe: Features vertical highlight stripe on the left side
layout.responsive: Adjusts padding and spacing for different breakpoints

features.highlight_stripe: Vertical highlight stripe provides visual emphasis
features.wide_link: Title link covers entire component area for better usability

requirements: Title must be provided for component to render
Link should have proper focus states and keyboard navigation
Wide link area should be implemented for better usability
Sufficient color contrast for text and background

properties: Wide link implementation for entire component clickability
aria.keyboard: Full keyboard navigation through interactive elements

considerations: Ensure the highlight stripe doesn't interfere with screen reader navigation
Provide clear indication of external links when applicable
Consider the semantic meaning of the component as a call-to-action

design.visual_hierarchy: Prominent design intended to draw attention to important next steps
design.highlight_stripe: Left-side colored stripe provides visual emphasis
design.typography: Uses heading-5 typography for title prominence

guidelines: Use for highlighting important next steps or calls-to-action
Include descriptive content to explain the value of the action
Consider placement at the end of content sections
Limit to one primary next step per page section

examples.title: Basic Next Step
examples.description: Simple next step with title and link
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:next-step' with { theme: 'light', title: 'Get started today', link: { url: '/signup' } } only %}

examples.title: Next Step with Content
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:next-step' with { theme: 'light', title: 'Contact our team', content: 'Our experts are ready to help you find the right solution.', link: { url: '/contact' } } only %}

examples.title: External Next Step
examples.description: Next step linking to external resource
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:next-step' with { theme: 'light', title: 'Join our community', content: 'Connect with thousands of users on our forum.', link: { url: 'https://forum.example.com', is_external: true, is_new_window: true } } only %}

best_practices: Use clear, action-oriented language in titles
Explain the benefit or value of taking the next step
Test the visual prominence in page context

unit_tests: External and new window link attributes work
accessibility_tests: Screen reader accessibility of component content
Focus management and wide link behavior

extraction.notes: Complete component analysis including highlight stripe design, wide link functionality, and call-to-action patterns
